original_text: Remember, I beseech thee, that thou hast made me as the clay; and wilt thou bring me into dust again?
korean_text: 기억하옵소서 주께서 내 몸 지으시기를 흙을 뭉치듯 하셨거늘 다시 나를 티끌로 돌려보내려 하시나이까

sentences.original_text: that thou hast made me as the clay;
and wilt thou bring me into dust again?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 나를 다시 먼지로 돌아가게 하시겠습니까?
